purpose: Event sponsors for CourtLab Live Combines

sponsors.activationBooth: REDARC performance gear demo + 'Best Athlete' award sponsorship
sponsors.personalizationAnchor: Already backing women's basketball. Performance/outdoor brand. Perfect for athlete awards.
sponsors.draftedIntro:
Hi there,

REDARC's 3-year Hoops & Her partnership shows you GET basketball community.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We're running the Easter Classic 2026 (April 3-6, 300+ athletes) — the biggest youth basketball event in SA. We'd love REDARC as our headline sponsor.

What you get:
• "Best Athlete Award" (REDARC branded)
• Activation booth + merchandise showcase
• Logo on all materials + stage
• Speaking opportunity
• 600+ families seeing your brand

Interested? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael

sponsors.personalizationAnchor: NBL flagship for SA. Youth pipeline visibility. Player appearances = massive draw.
sponsors.draftedIntro:
Hi there,

The 36ers' reach in SA is unmatched. Easter Classic 2026 has 300+ future pathway players.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We'd love the 36ers as headline sponsor + community partner.

What you get:
• Activation booth + merchandise sales opportunity
• Player appearance slot (meet-and-greet)
• Logo on all materials
• Direct access to 600+ young basketball families
• Co-branding on verified player stats

Your pathway visibility + our data = perfect alignment.

Interested? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael

sponsors.draftedIntro:

Young basketball athletes = future physio clients. Easter Classic 2026 has 300+ of them.

This is pure client acquisition. Interested?

courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
